newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Belgian shares seen higher at start.
newsitem.headline: Belgian shares seen higher at start.

text.p: 0730 GMT - Belgian shares seen moving further into record territory at start, with other markets starting firmer on Fed's confirmation Wednesday that no change in U.S. rates for now.
* Pre-opening block trades in most Bel-20 .BFX shares, led in volume terms by Delhaize, GIB and Barco.
Most prices higher, or well bid, dealers said.
* Retailer Colruyt marked slightly lower in pre-opening dealing after nine percent rise on Wednesday
* Bel-20 index .BFX ended Wednesday at record 2,444.93 points, up 1.51 percent.
